title: Snowed Inn for Christmas Anthology
description: A record-breaking blizzard is on the way to Winter Falls . . . and close quarters sometimes make for strange bedfellows!Led by their mayor, the citizens of Winter Falls rally together to keep everyone safe during the storm. Falling in love wasn’t part of the plan, but cuddling next to the fire and kissing under the mistletoe leads to a whole lot of romance for these nine couples. Spend this holiday season with nine of your favorite romance authors as they introduce you to a ski town where love is in the air. This collection includes ALL NEW stories that are hot enough to melt all the snow headed for Winter Falls.* * * * *Note: Initially in 2021, the first nine books in this series were only available in this anthology. Each book was titled using the couples names. Since then, individual books have been issued, with new titles, and some stories have been updated.Snowed Inn series:Book #1: Snow Help Me (Lincoln & Bethenny) by Fiona DavenportBook #2: Snow Plow (Nick & Quinn) by Frankie LoveBook #3: In Snow Deep (Gavin & Tory) by Rochelle PaigeBook #4: Snow Inn Love (Caleb & Raven) by Elle ChristensenBook #5: Cabin Kisses (Levi & Georgina) by Hope FordBook #6: Their Snowy Night (Saint & Marley) by Lucy DarlingBook #7: Our Snowy Night (Rowan & Charlee) by Ella GoodeBook #8: Ring Around the Posey (Eli & Posey) by Layla FrostBook #9: Force of Nature (Logan & Demi) by Brynne Asher
author: Elle Christensen
